tossup_question: 25) CHEMISTRY  Which of the following groups of elements have the strongest or highest electron affinities, corresponding to the largest release of energy:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Group 1A 
X) Group 2A 
Y) Group 7A 
Z) Group 8A
bonus_question: 25) CHEMISTRY  Which of the following techniques employs a moving phase and a stationary phase to separate components of a mixture:
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) filtration
X) centrifugation 
Y) distillation
Z) chromatography
